MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 area of Dalkeith. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:02am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Newbattle Abbey substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:45am on Sunday, 28 March 2021
